sqlView.name: Data Approval ( USED in app )
sqlView.sqlQuery: select ou.uid as ouId, ds.uid as dsId, da.accepted, da.creator, da.created from dataapproval da INNER JOIN dataapprovallevel dalevel on da.dataapprovallevelid = dalevel.dataapprovallevelid INNER JOIN dataset ds on da.workflowid = ds.workflowid inner join organisationunit ou on da.organisationunitid = ou.organisationunitid inner join period pe on da.periodid=pe.periodid where dalevel.uid='${dataLevel}' and pe.startdate='${startDate}' and pe.enddate='${endDate}'

sqlView.name: Data Approval - Get OUs by level ( USED in app )
sqlView.sqlQuery: select DISTINCT ( select uid from organisationunit where uid=oustr.uidLevel${level} ) as ouId, ds.uid as dsId, ( select name from organisationunit where uid=oustr.uidLevel${level} ) as ouLevel${level}, ds.name as "Data Set" from organisationunit ou INNER JOIN _orgunitstructure oustr on ou.organisationunitid = oustr.organisationunitid left JOIN datasetsource ds_ou on ds_ou.sourceid = ou.organisationunitid left JOIN dataset ds on ds.datasetid = ds_ou.datasetid where oustr.level >= ${level} and ds.workflowid is not null and ds.periodtypeid = ( select periodtypeid from periodtype where name = '${periodTypeName}' ) and oustr.uidLevel${ouLevel} = '${ouId}' order by ouId, ds.uid, ouLevel${level},"Data Set"

sqlView.name: Data Approval - Get User names
sqlView.sqlQuery: select userinfoid, firstname || ' ' || surname as fullname from userinfo
